website_summaries.verdict: A simple, classic toy that will last for years with tons of open-ended play options.
pros: These stacking cups are updated with bright colors and lots of sizes
Don't underestimate the basic design, since these stacking cups have unlimited potential for play from the baby days into older childhood
Parents love the easy nesting, stacking, pouring, sinking, floating, and building possibilities
With 10 pieces that stack up to 25" tall, babies will love the oversized design
Holes let water drain out to avoid mold or mildew growth
cons: Young babies can't stack, but parents still love them for all their other uses

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with 3 pieces missing. I’m not at all happy with this purchase. When I left my first review stating the issue, I was told it would not post. I’m letting everyone know that this item does not include 10 cups, and when you try to write an honest review about it, they take it down, and have not even offered to correct the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Simple, for all-abilities, EASY to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, fun and also good in the bathtub or at the beach. Very versatile and highly recommended for average-developing children as well as kids with autism or other challenges. I found these to be VERY valuable to have around when we had a staph infection in the house because they are SO easy to clean. You can boil or put them in the dishwasher. They are lightweight, attractive for teethers and fun for many ages. NOTE: there are two little holds in the bottom of each cup. They don’t drain quickly, but just know they don’t hold the liquids. I would still buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love these stacking cups so much
customer_reviews.text: Love these stacking cups so much, bought two packages of them one for inside and one to take the the beach and use outside! My son is 9 months and plays with them daily! He loves to watch me stack them up and he knocks them down! They are great and well made! I am a mother of 3 children and had purchased different stacking cups a few years back with for my oldest child and they had labels that started to peel off and did not stack as well as these cups do! I would recommend these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mom33

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, well-made, good design, great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our 14- month-old grandson, who loves to stack. Kept him away from the breakables on low shelves while he was visiting. They're pretty colors, nicely made witn clean simple design, and easy to stack. Each has two very small holes on the bottom, which makes them fun for water play. They nest very neatly, fitting closely.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Many ways to play!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these - he played with them at 5 months and still plays with them at 13 months. I expect this "toy" will continue to be a favorite as he grows. These cups help him understand inside vs outside, tall and short, also size and colors! Meanwhile, he has fun trying to stack them into a tower or fitting them inside each other. Of course, banging them together and throwing them remains lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Marichal

customer_reviews.title: Months of fun with this toy
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for our daughter when she was five months old and she still loves playing with these cups at almost 9 Months old! She hasn’t learned how to stack them yet but she loves knocking over the cup towers. These were a great toy to motivate her with when she was just learning to crawl.
customer_reviews.author: Lawfin06

customer_reviews.title: At a year old she is not yet stacking them but the bright colors attracted her attention and she had great fun picking them up and banging them on things
customer_reviews.text: The Rainbow Stacking & Nesting Cups fit the bill for our grandaughter. At a year old she is not yet stacking them but the bright colors attracted her attention and she had great fun picking them up and banging them on things. They do stack nicely and are made of a study plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Ann Handrich

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Our 8 month old granddaughter loves them. Her favorite colors are the purple and the blue. Those are the two she picks up the most. We stack them for her and she knocks them over. Sometimes we do two towers because of her age rather than one tall tower. As she gets older we will build one tower. She can spend a long time playing with all the cups.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Favorite baby toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby gets interested, then bored with toys very quickly---but not with these stacking cups! He's had these for months, plays with them every day, and absolutely loves them. There are a million uses... talking into them to make your voice sound funny, banging them against a drum or Tamborine, putting them inside each other upside down, putting balls and other small toys inside them, throwing them out of the playpen or off a high chair tray. The possibilities are endless!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Henrich

customer_reviews.title: They're great!! I bought these for our 9 month ...
customer_reviews.text: They're great!! I bought these for our 9 month old granddaughter and she loves them! I keep them at our home for when she visits and she loves them each time she comes over. I picked these since I knew they'd still be fun for her through the years. I look forward to taking them to the beach with her in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great stacking toy
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my daughter's favorite toys. She's too young to stack herself, but one of her favorite activities is letting me stack so she can knock them down. They are also good toys for bathtub play since they have holes in the bottom. The only thing I'd change if I could is the color order to make them "ROY G. BIV" ordered (colors of the rainbow). The blue and purples are switched around.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- 10 cups for more fun!
customer_reviews.text: These cups are exactly what I was looking for, for my granddaughter. I love that there are 10 cups, instead of six or eight like some sets. These are a good size for little hands and they are very well made. They stack easily- my granddaughter figured them out right away and loves to stack them! They even have cute animals on the bottoms. They are safer because of the holes in them- to prevent suffocation if the child puts them on their mouth- they can't suction on. I will look for other products by this thoughtful company!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: They’re fun (?) for some reason.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get it. Then again, I’m not an 8-month-old. This “toy” seemed stupid to me, and overpriced for a stack of plastic cups. But our baby seems to enjoy banging them on the floor, tossing them around, and putting them his mouth on them. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: mark g

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my Grandson. He played with them at the doctor's office and tried to take them home with him. He was so happy when he got them and plays with them often. Very sturdy and well made with no dangers to a toddler. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Pookie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old loves these and played with them daily for months after we bought them. She's on to other things now, but will still play with them when I get them out. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This toddler toy is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler gotten so much use out of these. I took them with me whenever we traveled because she would take them apart and stack and nest them. She’s a bit older now, but still enjoys using them and finds new ways to make them interesting like hiding toys inside them. They are fun in the bath too. A must have for any toddler.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of when my kids were little.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my great niece. Nice light weight cups for small hands to stack. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but some changes from the old ones
customer_reviews.text: I was sad to discover the holes in the bottom of the cups as well as the updated color scheme. Would have preferred them to hold water.
customer_reviews.author: thebeloved

customer_reviews.title: Good Toy to Teach Basic Skills
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the grandchild of a friend because my son loved it so much when he was young. This one is good quality and was delivered on time. What more could you want.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Ireland

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr. old's Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My child was gifted these for his birthday and he loves them (his 3 year old big sister agrees too). Very easy to keep clean as I just pop them in the dishwasher and they're ready to go again. They stack well and have kept very well too. My only complaint would be, my dog also loves them and has left a few marks on some! Overall, happy with purchase and would definitely pass on to family/friends as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: CLefere

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these stacking cups. There are so many ways to play with them - from babies knocking down the stacks to playing with them in the bathtub, to stacking them up themselves. Even the 5 year old finds new ways to play with them - capturing Pokemon, garages for little cars, pretend cups, etc. Definitely a "must have" basic toy for any baby/toddler household!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Not 20 bucks worth
customer_reviews.text: Um...$18 for flimsy plastic cups? Im annoyed. Thought these were the nicer set of these. They're very cheap. Definitely not worth almost $20. They're ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: The best stacking cups
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite stacking cups for my baby. They include 10 cups when most others only go up to 8. The colors are bold and bright and they are very durable! Definitely high quality. They are a little on the pricey side but you get what you pay. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: AngChick

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old grandson started playing with these since he was 13 months. He plays with these during bath and in the living room. He's still interested after 4 months and is finding more ways to play with these.
customer_reviews.author: Wan Wan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son who is almost ten months loves loves loves these things... I’ve bought a few pretty pricey toys but he just keeps going back to these little cups. There pretty durable and love the colors and the little different animals on them.
customer_reviews.author: Star Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great cup set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of cups. Brilliant colors, thick and durable, stack steady and a big hit with the grandbaby. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda RDH

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kids - Easy to Put Away
customer_reviews.text: My young grandson (almost 3) loves these nesting cups - stacks them many ways - they're bright and colorful and from my point of view - a snap to put up when company is company. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie T

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for learning and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my (15 month old, at the time) son several months ago, and they are still in “play” 5 months later. He loves to stack, and he quickly learned how the different sizes go together.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie K

customer_reviews.title: Fun / Cute and my son loves playing with them
customer_reviews.text: These cups are super cute and fun to play with. We use them on trips, in the bath, stacking, putting things in them. We will be using them for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors and the animals on the bottom. They work well and my baby loves them, although at 10 months, he mostly likes unstacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Sonn

customer_reviews.title: Great in the tub
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 8 month old granddaughter. She loves playing with them - the colors are bright, she grabs and claps them together for the sound. She already understands that they nest. Her almost 3 year old sister loves playing with them, too. Great in the tub, in the sand at the beach, on the floor just playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandson and he loves them. They are a great teaching tool for colors and putting things in order.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Herren

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous toy. My 13 month grandson has been using them for awhile. At first just randomly now learning to stack them in order. And of course to knock them all down!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Great stacking cups
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best set of stacking cups. Comes with more the other sets I've seen, and the colors are bright and fun for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic, our little 2 year old got them for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, our little 2 year old got them for her birthday, and she loves them. Very bright and colorful, and she stacks and nests them staying very busy. Very compact for storage when nested, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Toy
customer_reviews.text: These stacking cups are a basic for kids. They're so fun for so many stages of life and helpful in learning colors, stacking the cups, building towers and of course the fun of knocking them over. So worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandson LOVE these (18 months old). He likes to stack them and break up the stack. Great colors and size - perfect for a toddler to learn balance and coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple developmental/educational toy for a baby/toddler
customer_reviews.text: My one year old LOVES this bath toy. She suddenly reached that developmental milestone where she loves putting things inside other things; stacking or loading and unloading can keep her occupied for long periods of time. This is a simple toy which is great for teaching fine motor skills but also good for learning colors and can be used for rinsing hair in the bath etc. bonus that they stack up for easy cleanup and storage. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Annalee Baker

customer_reviews.title: my 10 year grandson was with him and I believe he had as much fun as the baby
customer_reviews.text: These stacking/nesting cups were a birthday gift for my one year old nephew. He began playing with them immediately. Not only that, my 10 year grandson was with him and I believe he had as much fun as the baby. They are fun and a good solid learning toy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves these to play with in the bath, on his swing as they are easy for him to handle, stack and scoop water with. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Always a favorite
customer_reviews.text: Stacking cups are the best! My son loves how high the tower gets when he stacks up these cups :)
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Crowd pleaser
customer_reviews.text: I know these are for babies, but I bought them for my 2 yr old and she loves them so much, even my 5 yr old enjoys them. A simple toy, but toddlers just enjoy stacking things too.
customer_reviews.author: Megab812

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: We like to bring these cups with us when traveling because they provide lots of entertainment and engagement for our baby
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Baby loved the colors and playing with them.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves playing with these blocks, both stacking then and just holding them. At one she isn't very good at stacking then but I think it is important that they are interested in interacting with the toy. They came quickly and were received in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G Unfried

customer_reviews.title: Super Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 yr old and he loves them! Keeps him entertained for hours, stacking up, knocking down and restacking em! Easy to clean from dirty hands and even does great playing in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Amusing,self learning
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for awhile now, and my grandson finds all kinds of ways to amuse himself with it.
customer_reviews.author: jmh

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these every single day! We started by building him towers to knock over, but he's since moved on to building his own towers and learning which sizes go into which. Excellent simple and fun learning toy. Love these cups!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Cup of Joy for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: This gift for a 5 month old baby. Planning to use a small part of the set, 3 cups at a time to avoid confusion, and adding more as he grows. I liked the picture on the Amazon screen showing different uses for this toy.
customer_reviews.author: E T Morris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy!  My grandson’s favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson at 10 months. He is very curious, with good motor skills. He plays with many toys once and gets bored, but this is his favorite! There are endless ways to use these cups. A very rare combination of safe but entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: KsZrex

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect developmental toy for a baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect developmental toy for a baby. Bought it for my grandson at 9 months. At first he loved the colors and feel, then began to understand how to put one inside the other, then enjoyed knocking down stacked cups. Now at a year is beginning to stack them himself. They can be used in tub or water table to scoop and pour water, or at beach or sandbox to scoop and mold sand. Lots of uses, bright colors, open-ended play that will last through the early years.
customer_reviews.author: General

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toddler toys for bath and stacking, learning colors and relative sizes. Great! A lasting versatile toy
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: fun toy
customer_reviews.text: my son loves stacking and knocking these over - thinks its the most hilarious thing ever
customer_reviews.author: marly

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy !
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them ! They are high quality, easy to clean and all !
customer_reviews.author: Shyiane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old loves these stacking cups! They are easy to manipulate and are so cute! Super easy to clean as well! Def worth the price & highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: dmoney127

customer_reviews.title: Multiple play items
customer_reviews.text: Gives your child three different play items all in one package
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Plus they are good for holding little people
customer_reviews.text: My 14month old loves them. To be clear, actually loves knocking them over once I've stacked them. Plus they are good for holding little people, and chewing on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My child can safely play Godzilla
customer_reviews.text: By far my toddlers favorite toy. Every morning she builds her “princess tower” and then smacks the whole thing down with a demented giddy laugh just to start all over again. Even her projectile vomit is no match for the ease in which these cups are cleaned. 5 out of 5 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Bought for african grey parrot
customer_reviews.text: easy a clean . safe as far as i can tell but he is afraid of everything. I had fun with them if you get two sets you can make lil cities and destroy kinda like stitch did in lilo and stitch, can confirm fun to do.
customer_reviews.author: milo

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: By far the most used toy in my house. My daughter plays with them almost everyday. We got them when she was a baby and we still get use out of them at age three.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the cups
customer_reviews.text: I love it , teaches kids how to problem solve by figuring out which cup goes first my son loves it keeps him Intertained for a good 15 minutes and he’s 1 so his attention span is very short
customer_reviews.author: Monica Soria

customer_reviews.title: One of our most loved toys
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my one year only twins, probably one of their favorite toys for 5months now
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Standley

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They do have holes in the bottoms, though, so not as fun for bath time, but otherwise they're wonderful and fun
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very good baby cups
customer_reviews.text: The cups stack and collapse well, they are colorful, and there's animal art on the bottom. So as far as baby cups these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: he happily knocks them down
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old grandson loves these cups. He enjoys nesting and un-nesting them, and when I build a tower or line them up, he happily knocks them down! We talk about the colors and the sizes. He carries a few when he walks around. He also plays with them in the tub. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great colors and construction plus quieter than pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: my grand niece loves these. great colors and construction plus quieter than pots and pans. easy to tote from house to house.
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: Great baby toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these so much. We stack them up and he loves knocking them down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reza

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for 1-2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Loved: 10 cups; stack together beautifully and can build tower. Great toy/activity for 1-2 year old. Disliked: holes in each cup, so child can’t use with water, or in a water table. Not an improvement on the original classic design.
customer_reviews.author: Aliana Scurlock

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this toy. Old but still a classic. well made
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Murphy Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for the generations.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My kids loved these now my grandkids love them!
customer_reviews.author: UtteRuiN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, and Im sure my grandaughter will love playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: He enjoys stacking them and knocking them over and it is a great way for him to work on his motor skills
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves these! He enjoys stacking them and knocking them over and it is a great way for him to work on his motor skills. I will be purchasing more sets to have on hand
customer_reviews.author: Tamdog33

customer_reviews.title: One of her favorite things to play
customer_reviews.text: this is nothing special at all but our 19 month old LOVES stacking and knocking these down.One of her favorite things to play. Definitely happy we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Chase's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Versatile - don’t need another toy
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves these and there is so much you can do with them. She can bang them, stack, bathtub play, etc. We also play fun cup games with them. It reminds me to keep it simple with toys. She is happy with only her cups.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Simple Joyful Play
customer_reviews.text: Hours of enjoyment. Exactly what my baby needed to stack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren love these stacking blocks
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren love these stacking blocks. They range in age from 5 Years old to 9 months. The 5 year old likes stacking them while the younger ones like to knock them down. It is a great toy for different age children to play with each other. The bright colors attract the kids to them. great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old loves this! He can stack both ways and loves to knock down the tower! Will be good for the bath or outside pool in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hostrander

customer_reviews.title: Great for 6mo to preschool age.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean Grandson (7mo) took to these immediately. They will be a go-to for a few years. Good color mix, easy clean. Each cup has a drain hole and a playful pattern embossed in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E Latham III

customer_reviews.title: Good quality stacking toy
customer_reviews.text: These are my one year olds favorite toy now. It's very nice that there are multiple ways to stack them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Byram

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and stack easily
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves knocking these down, stacking them, and throwing them!! They are colorful, sturdy, and stack easily.
customer_reviews.author: poemgirl

customer_reviews.title: She is not quite old enough to play with them ...
customer_reviews.text: She is not quite old enough to play with them but in a few more months we will see how she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and they stack nicely and have cute ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and they stack nicely and have cute animal faces on the bottom of the insides of each cup. There are also two holes in the bottom of each cup, making it fun to use in the tub and safe to use with children who put them up to their own faces.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: They were a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Branson loves them he plays with them everyday and loves to carry them from room to room.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: My children love these! They are durable and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa1229

customer_reviews.title: Some of the simplest toys are the best!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these cups. He plays with these more than any toy in his toy box. He is 10mths old.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher LeTexier

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES these cups!
customer_reviews.text: Every morning my 1 year old daughter wakes up and goes right for these stacking ups. She has about 500 other toys to play with, but this is always what she chooses..
customer_reviews.author: Steven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Cups Availabe
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They fit together well for stacking and nesting. There are two of each color to teach matching as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: ... not only does she play with them they are useful for her teething as well
customer_reviews.text: The baby loves these stacking cups not only does she play with them they are useful for her teething as well !
customer_reviews.author: JANE LINSALATO

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 month old who loved it! He’s 9 months now and still enjoys knocking down the tower and playing with the cups. Great in the bath too! Cheap (but doesn’t look cheaply made) and fun for baby!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson to help entertain him on a 7 hour flight and then to play with at the beach and in the tub. They have been perfect and he continues to play with them at home!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Matzker

customer_reviews.title: Safe and fun
customer_reviews.text: The added small holes make them fun for the bath. Also makes them safer (no suction) when smaller children are playing
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mary

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves these cups! They are easy to bring on a trip, as they are compact. Whenever any other children are over or if we bring these with us to a friends house, the kiddos gravitate to these. A definite recommendation for any baby/toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: Serve their purpose. Son is two and still loves stacking and knocking them over.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate stacking!
customer_reviews.text: Fantasicly simple and my child is enthralled by stacking them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: endless fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cups! I stack them up and he knocks them down and giggles...endless fun
customer_reviews.author: chantele

customer_reviews.title: My 16 month old loves these
customer_reviews.text: She stacks them, uses them to play make believe, comes up with games, hides other small toys in them... they are such a useful toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Forever Fun
customer_reviews.text: My nearly 2 yr old granddaughter loves to play with these cups. She wants to know eack cups color. My older grandson builds them into a tower and she knocks it down. I remember my own kids playing with similar nesting blocks. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Costello

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy and safe toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for teaching colors and how to put things back where they go!

customer_reviews.title: A classic!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 8 months old now and enjoying the cups - at this stage mostly putting them in her mouth and knocking the stacks I make over! They are well made and will last her for many years. A classic toy.

customer_reviews.author: kenn3

product_meta.title: Rainbow Stacking & Nesting Cups Baby Building Set. 10 Pieces. With Embossed Animal Characters. For Indoor, Outdoor, Bathtub, And Beach Fun Toy. Multi Colors
feature_bullets: BPA, Phosphate, and Lead-Free - Made from high-quality plastic material that is safe for all ages! It’s the perfect learning toy for newborns (under 6 months old), infants (up to 12 months) and toddlers (1 year old to 18 months). They come in a 10 piece set and stack up to 25 inches tall.

Great for Educational Play - ​Our toys improve motor control and hand/eye skills in young children, they also help you teach sorting sizes, counting to 10, and learning colors. Playing these developmental games encourages brain development in babies, all the way up to preschool.

Make It Playtime, Anytime! - ​There’s no end to what boys and girls can create with the right toy. From tea parties to sandcastles at the beach, or boat races in the pool or bath. Great for the playground, classroom or in the car! Plus, each cup has an animal character embossed on the bottom, ​perfect for stamping playdough!

Classic, Colorful and Safe - ​These stacker toys are very light weight and the ring shape makes stacking and knocking them over safe for children. ​Your kids will love building these blocks into colorful towers​ (almost as much as they’ll love knocking them down!)

Why Choose KidsThrill? - Our toys are made with premium, non toxic materials that are tested to ensure they can withstand some serious playtime. We’re excited to inspire young minds with a collection of toys that encourages creative development and endless fun!
